mapper.select: select count(dongCode) as count, dongCode, juso from happyhouse.interestarea group by dongCode order by count desc limit 10;

SELECT "전체" as juso, count(*) as count FROM happyhouse.interestarea UNION SELECT juso, count(juso) as count from (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(juso, " ", 2) as juso FROM happyhouse.interestarea) t GROUP BY t.juso ORDER BY count desc limit #{num};
mapper.delete: delete from happyhouse.interestarea where dongcode = #{dongCode} and id = #{id}
